channel.title: FLF - Open Mike with Michael Thiessen
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.

item.title: ARRESTED for SINGING PSALMS; HE FOUGHT THE "LAW" and WON! ft. Gabe Rench [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ July 22, 2023
On this episode of Open Mike, Dr. Thiessen is joined by co-host of CrossPolitic, podcaster and entrepreneur Gabe Rench, to talk about his recent legal victory after being arrested for singing psalms outside.

item.title: Mind or Matter? Discerning Causation in Counselling ft. Amanda Chan [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ July 15, 2023
On this episode of Open Mike, Dr. Thiessen is joined by a former occupational therapist who worked in brain injury rehabilitation, Amanda Chan, to talk about the importance of determining the cause of counselees' problems. Is it Mind or Matter?

DID YOU PARTICIPATE IN LCC'S NEWEST INITIATIVE, "TRUE READINGS FROM TRUE ROYALTY"?
